00013 int _tmain(int argc, _TCHAR* argv[])
00014 {
00015         const char* infile = NULL;
00016         const char* outfile = NULL;
00017         const char* optstring = "hi:o:";
00018         int     c = getopt (argc, argv, optstring);
00019         while(c > 0){
00020                 switch(c) {
00021                 case 'i':
00022 //                      infile = strdup(optarg);
00023                         infile = optarg;
00024                         break;
00025                 case 'o':
00026                         outfile = optarg;
00027                         break;
00028                 case '?':
00029                 case 'h':
00030                 default:
00031                         usage();
00032                         return -1;
00033                 }
00034                 c = getopt (argc, argv, optstring);
00035         }
00036         extern FILE *yyin, *yyout;
00037         FILE *out;
00038         if ( !infile || !outfile )
00039                 return usage, -1;
00040         yyin = fopen( infile, "r" );
00041         out = fopen( outfile, "w" );

00043         yyparse();
00044         fclose(yyin);
